mapper.select: SELECT Z.CHNL_LCLS_NM AS name , COUNT(X.CLC_DOC_NUM) AS value FROM BIG_TPC_TXT_ANAL X, BIG_TPC_RST Y, BIG_TPC_MST M, BIG_LCLS_CHNL Z WHERE X.CLC_DOC_NUM = Y.CLC_DOC_NUM AND Y.CHNL_LCLS_CD = Z.CHNL_LCLS_CD AND Y.ASK_NUM = M.ASK_NUM AND X.WRD_NM = #{keyword} AND M.CUST_ID = #{custId} AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY Z.CHNL_LCLS_NM
